attributes.action: make Barnsley, South Yorkshire, the capital city of England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been said that half of the residents of Barnsley are Muppets!. This is not the case! Half of the people of Barnsley are NOT Muppets and would like Barnsley to be the new Capital City. Most of us seldom get to leave Yorkshire because we can't afford to or we simply can't read a map.
If Barnsley were the Capital then we could all go and see summut by Lloyd Webber after a few pints in the Nags Head.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
